glossary.definition: Pakistan's benchmark stock market index tracking top 100 companies
glossary.urdu: پاکستان کا بنچ مارک اسٹاک مارکیٹ انڈیکس جو ٹاپ 100 کمپنیوں کو ٹریک کرتا ہے

glossary.definition: Investment vehicle pooling money from many investors to purchase securities
glossary.urdu: سرمایہ کاری کا ذریعہ جو کئی سرمایہ کاروں کے پیسے جمع کرکے سیکیورٹیز خریدتا ہے

glossary.definition: Payment made by companies to shareholders from profits
glossary.urdu: کمپنیوں کی جانب سے منافع سے شیئر ہولڈرز کو کی جانے والی ادائیگی

faqs.question: What is the minimum amount needed to start investing?
faqs.answer: You can start investing with as little as PKR 1,000. Our platform supports small investments to help beginners get started.

faqs.question: Is InvestPro Shariah-compliant?
faqs.answer: Yes, we offer a complete range of Shariah-compliant investment options reviewed by our Islamic finance advisory board.

faqs.question: How does the AI recommendation system work?
faqs.answer: Our AI analyzes market data, company fundamentals, and your risk profile to provide personalized investment recommendations.
